Cardemon has many benefits , If you intake it , 
It can help you to be cured from many physical problems ......Cardamom is used for digestion problems including heartburn, intestinal spasms, irritable bowel syndrome (IBS), intestinal gas, constipation, liver and gallbladder complaints, and loss of appetite .
